Class Square

java.lang.Object
Figure
Square
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Square
extends Figure
This class is used to create square with a few parametrs.

  • Method Details

    • isMouseOver

      public boolean isMouseOver​(int x, int y)
      This boolean method is used to get parametrs and check. if the mouse cursor is over the figure or it is not.
      Specified by:
      isMouseOver in class Figure
      Parameters:
      x - This is the x position of mouse cursor relative to the window.
      y - This is the y position of mouse cursor relative to the window.
      Returns:
      true if the mouse is over the figure. False otherwise.

    • draw

      public void draw​(java.awt.Graphics g)
      This draw(Graphics g) method is used to paint the square.
      Specified by:
      draw in class Figure
      Parameters:
      g - This is the graphics used to paint square in repaint() method.
